title: Why does everyone crit on me?
body: 1 of every 2 shots a opponent does to me usually crits even without crit items. I have been crit from level 1-18 non-stop for the following 2 days. When i decide use a tanky champ and build armor and health , Yasuo( 90% there is gonna be a Yas when i play a tanky  champ) still  2 shots me even if he is not fed. Could someone please tell if it's my horrible luck or something? Since i have had enough getting my health bar wrecked by Yi's doing 800 dmg alpha strikes level 8.

replies.body: they can have full crit chance runes.They quite possibly have crit items. Even tho you said they dont.
I usually check the guy that crits me the most during the match and they mostly have AD runes.

i can come on lane as volibear and 3 hit some one dead with W 3 autos 1 W dead early game also,  but masteries and ad runes help alot

You notice the times when someone with low crit chance crits you. The other 10 times when they dont crit you you think nothing of it. This is why it SEEMS like people are critting you more than they should, when in reality they're probably not

Looking at your match history there seems to be a reasonable explanation. You're just versing a lot of people who build crit chance or play champions with abilities that might appear to be crits (seeing a lot of Ashe, Quinn, and a few GPs). In fact I only saw 2-3 games where someone on the other team **wasn't** building crit, and they were all ARAM.
Give us a video of you being 2 shot any game any time when your opponent hasn't built crit then we can talk.
While playing a Tank too, I'm sure this is legit.
